Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: The people are talking about Labor's upcoming budget and the need for cost of living relief. A few posts call for caution though claiming that any such relief would further increase the budget deficit. Meanwhile some urge the government to provide aid to those who are financially disturbed citing the rising cost of living pressures. A post even suggested cancelling the submarine project instead of adding taxes. The overall theme is concern for the economy and the welfare of Australians.
